export default function HoldersCard({ name, cardNumber, month, year, cardDetails, isEmpty, }) { function formatMonth(month) { if (month < 10) return `0${month}`; else return month; } return (

{cardDetails.cardNumber === "" ? cardNumber ? cardNumber : "0000 0000 0000 0000" : cardDetails.cardNumber === "" ? "0000 0000 0000 0000" : cardDetails.cardNumber}

{cardDetails.name === "" ? name ? name : "Jane Appleseed" : cardDetails.name === "" ? "Jane Appleseed" : cardDetails.name} {cardDetails.month === "" ? month ? formatMonth(month) : "00" : cardDetails.month === "" ? "00" : formatMonth(cardDetails.month)} / {cardDetails.year === "" ? year ? year : "00" : cardDetails.year === "" ? "00" : cardDetails.year}
); }
